name: Merge Hexagon Block: Hexa Pops
description:
Merge Hexagon Block - Hexa Puzzle Game is a remix of number merge, bubble shooting and match-3 games. More you play, you can’t stop playing this game. Too much addictive game.

The game shoot the tiles 2,4,8,16,32,64,... you need to merge these number to greater.

HOW TO PLAY
• Tap screen & shoot bricks
• Merge tiles with the same number
• Get higher number and challenge high score

FEATURES
• Addictive and innovative game play
• Easy to learn, hard to master
• Minimalism graphics suitable for all ages
• Playing the game with your friends
• Exercise the brain and make people smart

Enjoy the game with your family ;)
